answers.answer: You did the right thing by going to the doctor and getting checked out. It is possible that anxiety/stress can be causing what you are feeling. You should think of what might be causing you to feel this way, presuming the doc gave you a clean bill of health, it sounds to me like you had a panic attack and tyke body is still shaken up by it . For some like myself I can be fine and then hit with anxiety. It seems like what you are going through is really effecting  your day to day life and you might want to consider talking to a mental health professional.

question: Hi I always had mild anxiety fast heart etc which I could manage easily..but in 2011 out of d blue I got severe weakness fatigue vertigo dizzy it was ferry creepySince then my head feels weird and I feel fatigue and dizzy unbalancedI'm 21yo. No diabetes normal CBC blood test normal urine testI don't have other diseases..what is causing me to feel sick:( the go sent me to dizzynes center but the appointment will be next year..its effecting my life as I'm often indoors due to feeling I'll
title: can anxiety cause this?
